messageBody:
import junit.extensions.ActiveTestSuite;
import junit.framework.Test;
import junit.framework.TestCase;
import junit.framework.TestSuite;

/**
* Running tests in parallel demo
*/
public class FooTest extends TestCase {
public FooTest(String name) {
super(name);
}
public void test1() throws InterruptedException {
Thread.sleep(10*1000);
}
public void test2() throws InterruptedException {
Thread.sleep(10*1000);
}

// this suite will run in 20 seconds
public static Test sequentialSuite() {
TestSuite suite =
new TestSuite();
suite.addTest(new FooTest("test1"));
suite.addTest(new FooTest("test2"));
return suite;
}

// this one in only 10 seconds
public static Test parallelSuite() {
TestSuite suite =
new ActiveTestSuite();
//====================
suite.addTest(new FooTest("test1"));
suite.addTest(new FooTest("test2"));
return suite;
}

public static Test suite() {
// return sequentialSuite();
return parallelSuite();
}
}
